title: Little Rock pharmacy vaccinates nearly 3,500 in one month
author: Desmond Nugent
description: The Arkansas Department of Health last month received the first shipment of Pfizer's COVID-19 vaccine to be administered to the first group of health care workers and long-term care facilities. This group is called 1-A, which includes first responders, long-term care facilities and health care workers.
cleaned_text: Thu, 07 Sep 2023 22:22:44 GMT (1694125364644) f21546d3a7b92848c6890935ca4e2b625f015352 4a6d0bb8f30f1b6a167248fbd029e9fd6e7edbb4 News Weather 7 On Your Side Community Game Center Watch Now 91 Fri 89 Sat 89 Little Rock pharmacy vaccinates nearly 3,500 in one month by Desmond Nugent Wed, January 13th 2021, 1:45 AM UTC Cornerstone Pharmacy at Rodney Parham says they have received 4,000 doses of the Pfizer vaccine within the last month
